description: The Game, Set, Matcha cocktail is the perfect blend of delicious, healthy matcha tea and tequila silver that'll make your tastebuds happy and keep you energized all day!
keywords: How To Make Game, Set, Matcha
name: Game, Set, Matcha

recipeInstructions.name: Combine matcha tea powder and an ounce of milk in a cocktail shaker and shake well.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine matcha tea powder and an ounce of milk in a cocktail shaker and shake well.

recipeInstructions.name: Add ice, tequila, honey, mint sprigs, and the rest of the milk, and shake.
recipeInstructions.text: Add ice, tequila, honey, mint sprigs, and the rest of the milk, and shake.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a highball with ice cubes.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a highball with ice cubes.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with the remaining mint sprig and serve.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with the remaining mint sprig and serve.
